title: Getting out of Bronze
body:
Hey, support Brand looking for decent team working players to get out of Bronze via Ranked Flex.

If you're good at top lane, mid lane, bot lane or jungle please enquire within.

You must need to know what your role is and you must know how to play effectively as a team member, have a positive attitude and not flame the enemy team.

I'm in Brisbane QLD and can play from 6pm-10pm weekdays, all day weekends.
If you're local we can have a meetup and enjoy beverages at the same time.

Solo queue is getting me down so I'm trying to recruit some loyal members to climb out with me.

It is preferable that you've never been out of Bronze before and know that you can. On the same token this won't be a carry so don't expect a free get out of Bronze ticket.

I'll keep an eye on the replies, you can also message me on my d/cord **Ben #0126**.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Jg/Mid main. I'm in Bronze 4 and I two trick {{champion:28}}  and {{champion:1}}  (but can play others if need be).

I'm fairly decent (here's my OP.GG: https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Percival9 ). Hope that's okay enough for you?? I know I have a few bad losses.

If you still want me on a team/duo then my IGN is Percival9.
